mapper.delete: delete from board where num = #{num} and writer = #{writer}
mapper.select: select * from board order by num
mapper.insert: insert into board (title, writer, content) values (#{title}, #{writer}, #{content})

choose.otherwise: and (writer like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or concat like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))

mapper.select: select num, title, writer, content, comment_cnt, view_cnt, reg_date from board where true order by num DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
select count(*) from board where true
